div.p: Sensitivities of observed annual-maximum daily precipitation over land ( solid lines with circles; dotted lines show the 90 % confidence interval) in 15° latitude bands relative to a global-mean surface temperature or b mean surface temperature over the 15° latitude band. Precipitation is from HadEX2, sensitivities are calculated for grid boxes with at least 30 annual values, and the median sensitivity is plotted for each 15° latitude band. Temperatures are over land and ocean from NOAA MLOST, and for b the temperature time series were smoothed with a 9-year running-mean filter
